forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with some sunshine during the afternoon hours. High 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then partly cloudy for the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 44F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. High 11C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High 51F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 12C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 54F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 6C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 43F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the evening becoming a steady rain overnight. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening becoming a steady rain overnight. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 11C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 53F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low near 5C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 41F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 9C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 48F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 40F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 5C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 41F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 58F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 46F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
